titles.title: A resolution notifying the President of the United States of the election of a Secretary of the Senate.
A resolution notifying the President of the United States of the election of a Secretary of the Senate.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the Senate on January 7, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Notifies the President of the election of the Honorable Emily J. Reynolds as the Secretary of the Senate.
